alert.note: Alert for Butler; Clermont; Hamilton; Warren (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 03 at 3:38PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF CENTRAL HAMILTON, SOUTHEASTERN BUTLER, NORTHERN CLERMONT AND SOUTHERN WARREN COUNTIES THROUGH 415 PM EDT... At 338 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located over Rossmoyne, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Cincinnati, Mason, Lebanon, Norwood, Forest Park, Newport, Sharonville, Blue Ash, Loveland, Springdale, Reading, Montgomery, North College Hill, Madeira, Wyoming, Cheviot, Villa Hills, Milford, Mount Healthy and Deer Park. This includes the following Interstates... I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 1 and 31. I-74 in Ohio between mile markers 14 and 19. I-75 in Ohio between mile markers 1 and 22. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for northern Kentucky...and southwestern Ohio. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
